name: nirvana-premium
description: An application about a job portal called Tu Primera Chamba

scripts.dev: docker compose down && docker compose up -d && pnpm --parallel dev
scripts.dev:watch: docker compose down && docker compose up -d && pnpm --parallel dev:watch
scripts.migrate: docker compose down && docker volume rm --force nirvana-premium_postgres-data && docker compose up -d && pnpm -F=api migrate
